residential.title: Initial Assessment
residential.description: Inspecting the apartment and discussing specific cleaning needs with the client.

residential.title: Planning and Preparation
residential.description: Choosing appropriate cleaning products and gathering necessary equipment.

residential.title: Decluttering and Organizing
residential.description: Removing clutter and organizing areas to create a clean and tidy space.

residential.title: Dusting and Surface Cleaning
residential.description: Dusting furniture, wiping down surfaces, and cleaning all accessible areas.

residential.title: Deep Cleaning Floors and Carpets
residential.description: Vacuuming, mopping floors, and spot-cleaning carpets and rugs.

residential.title: Bathroom and Kitchen Sanitization
residential.description: Thoroughly cleaning sinks, counters, and sanitizing high-touch areas.

residential.title: Final Quality Check and Client Approval
residential.description: Reviewing the apartment for quality assurance and presenting it to the client.
